Jobs.title: Owner - SEO / PPC Analyst
Jobs.description: ', 'Responsible for strategy and implementation of SEO techniques (on Page and Off Page), content management and usability, link building, social media promotions, keyword research and targeting, integration with HTML 5, maps and local optimization.', 'Also manages PPC campaigns with Campaign, Keywords, Ad Texts, Language and Location Targeting, Bids and Budgets, Websites and Landing Pages optimizations.', '', 'Some customers: Devmedia (www.devmedia.com.br ~800K visits/month), Linha de Código (www.linhadecodigo.com.br), JavaFree (javafree.uol.com.br), MrBool (mrbool.com), Total Makeup (www.totalmakeup.com.br), KSSF - Kardecian Study Society of Florida (Facebook Page and YouTube Channel - http://www.facebook.com/KSSF.Florida)', '', 'Latest results: ', '- From September 2011 to October 2012, I increased the organic searches from Mr Bool in 578%.', '- From February 2012 to October 2012, I increased the organic searches in 49%.', '- For Total Makeup website, I increased 190% their organic results from the last March 2012 results to May 2012 (3 months work) and their audience (visits) in 58% in the same period.', '

Jobs.title: Owner
Jobs.description: ', 'Has created and managed the Linha de Código website (www.linhadecodigo.com.br).', 'Started to learn and use some SEO technics on the website during this time.', 'Responsible for contacting the IT community, aiding some of the greatest professionals in Brazil by publishing their articles. Responsible for all technical content of the website.', 'Transformed the company from a simple website to an e-commerce company with sales of third-party books and material from own production (such as training CDs and DVDs). Has organized several events and sponsored several other events, including Microsoft events.', 'Promoted several successful workshops, provided management services and content translations for Microsoft.', 'Recognized by Microsoft as MVP - Microsoft Most Valuable professional for six consecutive years (2004-2009), due to the development, creation, management and growth of the website "Linha de Codigo".', 'Sold the company in 2010.', '

Jobs.title: Business partner
Jobs.description: ', 'Through contacts with Microsoft brought to Brazil the magazine in partnership with the publisher DevMedia.', 'Responsible for dissemination and deployment of the magazine in Brazil.', '

Jobs.company: .Net Magazine and Visual Studio Programmer Journal Brazil
Jobs.title: Editor
Jobs.description: ', 'Responsible for all editorial content, coordinate translations from English into Portuguese. Maintain editorial quality by including national articles (Brazilian authors).', '

Jobs.title: Technical Coordinator
Jobs.description: ', 'As Technical Coordinator of Canal Web website, a technical content website owned by Ediouro Holding (80%) and America Online - AOL (20%), I coordinated the redesign, increasing the audience, its efficiency and usability.', '

Jobs.title: Independant consultant
Jobs.description: ', 'I also worked in the years 1999 to 2001 as an independent consultant, having provided services for companies like Infnet (IT Master), Embratel, TV Globo, RadioClick.', '

summary: ', 'My goal is to make your website be more profitable and make your phone ring.', '', "Always focused on market trends, I have specialized in SEO, I am also a Google certified at PPC. I am addicted in website optimizations, with focus on better conversions. I work also with social media, increasing the exposure of the client's brand, as well as its integration with your target audience.", '', '14 years of experience in software development, including 3 years of SEO/PPC.', '', 'I have been awarded for 6 consecutive years (from 2004 to 2009) the Microsoft MVP (Most Valuable Professional), due to the development, creation, management and growth of the website "Linha de Codigo" (www.linhadecodigo.com.br).', '
